    Environment and Recycling

    We promote the bicycle as a sustainable alternative for polluting cars, busses, and scooters to support a healthy environment.

    Apart from that, we actively recycle by taking in old bikes, and refurbishing them to use in our social bicycle projects.

    We also organise bicycle events for youth to create awareness around environmental issues.

    Who Are We?

    We are an eco-friendly company who offer guided tours around the city on bicycles.

    We are stasioned in San Jose, California and would love to show you our glorious city.

    Our tour guides are of varying age and have allot of good stories to tell, and it is always a great feeling for us to share all these nice experiences with you!

    What We Do?

    We operate fully guided and self guided, leisure cycling tours in San Jose, California.

    With outstanding comfort, fantastic family or spa hotels, gourmet experiences, lovely spas, amazing sights, most beautiful and quiet routes, lots of history and culture, and other nice adventures.

    We are also pleased to make custom bike trips, or private cycling holidays for your group of friends or familiy.

    How We Do?

    All bike tours are designed by two in our staff with the results of our very careful and continuos research.

    We explore and check every details personally, to select the nicest routes, sights, hotels, restaurants, and the finest local specialities of our regions.

    It helps us provide you with the most enjoyable biking vacation you can ever have.

    Why choose us?

    We think you can get the most authentic answer, if you read What our guests say about us.

    Also check out our instagram account to watch beautiful pictures of our tours.

    Come and join us in San Jose, California, and you will see why our guests love our tours so much!
